item.title: Report E-2023100543
item.description:
Report E-2023100543

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-08
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On October 8, 2023, one (1) 50-pound bag of UN1487 was damaged during transit and released approximately one (1) cup of product to the trailer floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. The impacted bag was patched with tape for continued processing and shipping. Crews utilized hand tools to collect and containerize the free-standing material into one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal by R+L.

item.title: Report X-2023100115
item.description:
Report X-2023100115

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to a leaking bucket, once QA arrived they found out it was a leaking hazmat. Spill pads were used to clean up leaked product, plastic pail was put into a lined tote. DescribePack: When plastic pail was inspected it was found that the bottom was punctured by a sharp object when it was sat down forcefully. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Plastic pail was sat in an upside down position with hole upwards in a lined tote to prevent further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2023091054
item.description:
Report X-2023091054

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A package handler dropped the package and QA was called. We cleaned up the spill with absorbent pads. We secured the package and clean up materials in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Glass bottle shattered after being dropped DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081324
item.description:
Report X-2023081324

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: HEBRON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Shipment was discovered emitting a strong odor of fuel after acceptance over the counter. Inner contents: Fuel Adapter. Strong Odor only, no release. Outer packaging: hard plastic box. The shipment was held for FAA investigation and ultimately released to the customer. The customer has acknowledged that there was residue of jet fuel in the fuel hose.

item.title: Report X-2023081050
item.description:
Report X-2023081050

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED DUE TO BEING LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED 50 X N20 WHIP-IT CREAM CHARGERS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEED ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 24390W, AMAZON MFN, 333 108TH AVE. NE, BELLEVUE WA 98004.
